Title: 23 Terrorists Killed in Sistan and Baluchestan Province
Description: Islam Times - Brigadier General Ahmad Shafaei, spokesman for the 'Martyrs of Security' drills announced that the IRGC forces have killed 23 terrorists and captured 46 others during this drill.

Title: Several Explosions Reported in Damascus
Description: Islam Times - The local media in Syria reported hearing several explosions in the suburbs of Damascus, and also Israeli airstrike on the 'Al-Mazza' area.

Title: Zionist Regime’s Forces Martyr 28 More Palestinians in Gaza
Description: Islam Times - The Zionist regime’s forces martyred 28 Palestinians and injured 120 others in the Gaza Strip over the past 24 hours, the Palestinian health ministry in the enclave said.

Title: Turkish Parl. Speaker Urges Suspending Israeli UN Membership
Description: Islam Times - Turkish Parliament Speaker Numan Kurtulmuş has called for suspending the membership of the Israeli regime in the United Nations.

Title: Iran Condemns Israeli Attack on Islamic Jihad Office in Syria
Description: Islam Times - The Embassy of the Islamic Republic of Iran in Damascus strongly condemned the Zionist regime's attack on the Palestinian Islamic Jihad Movement Office in Syria which led to the martyrdom of two senior leaders of the movement.

Title: Israeli Football Fans Clash with France Supporters
Description: Islam Times - Israeli fans clashed with France supporters during a football match in a nearly empty stadium in Paris, just days after Israeli hooligans sparked violence in Amsterdam by chanting anti-Arab slogans.

Title: Trump Approves Plan to Mediate Lebanese Ceasefire
Description: Islam Times - US president-elect Donald Trump signed off on a proposal for a ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah movement in Lebanon during a meeting with Strategic Affairs Minister Ron Dermer at Mar-a-Lago last Sunday.

Title: IRGC Ground Force Nabs Terrorist Team in SE Iran, 4 Killed
Description: Islam Times - Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guards Corps (IRGC) Ground Force has dismantled a team of terrorist amid an ongoing major counterterrorism exercise in the country’s southeastern province of Sistan and Baluchestan.

Title: Sri Lanka’s Leftist Coalition Wins Snap General Elections
Description: Islam Times - Sri Lankan President Anura Kumara Dissanayake’s leftist coalition has achieved a landslide victory in snap parliamentary elections, delivering the self-described Marxist leader a powerful mandate to fight poverty and corruption in the crisis-stricken nation.

Title: APEC Leaders to Open Lima Summit as Trump Prepares to Return to Office
Description: Islam Times - Representatives from 21 members representing the Pacific Rim are meeting in Peru on Friday for the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum, the first global summit since US President-elect Donald Trump’s victory featuring several major world leaders.

Title: World Bank: Israeli Aggression Incurs $8.5bn in Economic Loss on Lebanon
Description: Islam Times - A new report by the World Bank says Israel’s brutal aggression against Lebanon has inflicted huge economic and physical losses on the country since last October.

Title: N Korean Leader Kim Orders Mass Production of Suicide Drones
Description: Islam Times - North Korean leader Kim Jong Un guided a test of suicide drones and ordered a mass production of the aerial weapon, saying the introduction of such drones around the world requires an urgent update of military theory.

Title: Elon Musk Meets with Iran's UN Ambassador: Report
Description: Islam Times - Contact was reportedly at Trump-allied billionaire’s request and could be significant for dismal US-Iranian relations.

Title: Trump Says Russia-Ukraine War ‘Gotta Stop’
Description: Islam Times - US President-elect Donald Trump said Thursday that his administration will work hard to end the Russia-Ukraine war.

Title: US Sanctions Syria Company for Alleged Links with Iran, Yemen
Description: Islam Times - The US Treasury Department imposed sanctions on Thursday on companies, individuals and vessels allegedly associated with a Syrian conglomerate that Washington said was funding Iran’s IRGC and Yemeni government.

Title: Japanese Princess Yuriko Dies at 101
Description: Islam Times - Japanese Princess Yuriko, the wife of wartime Emperor Hirohito’s brother and the oldest member of the imperial family, has died after her health deteriorated recently, palace officials said. She was 101.

Title: Iran’s Larijani Due in Lebanon after Syria Visit
Description: Islam Times - Ali Larijani, an advisor to Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei, will be visiting Lebanon after a trip to Syria.

Title: Israel Kills Paramedics, Rescuers in Lebanon Attacks
Description: Islam Times - Five Lebanese paramedics were among six people killed in an Israeli strike on a civil defense center in the country’s southern Nabatieh area, while 12 rescue workers were reported killed in a second attack on a civil defense center near Baalbek city.

Title: Araqchi Gives Details of Meeting with IAEA Chief
Description: Islam Times - Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi provided information about the contents of his meeting with Director General of the International Atomic Energy Agency Rafael Grossi in Tehran.

Title: Hezbollah Attacks Israeli Tel Haim Base
Description: Islam Times - The Lebanese Hezbollah resistance movement said it has for the first time targeted the Israeli regime’s Tel Haim military base in Tel Aviv, some 120 km from the Lebanese border.

Title: 2 Dead in Suspected Explosion in Germany
Description: Islam Times - Two people were killed and one was injured in a suspected explosion at a residential building in southwestern Germany on Thursday morning.

Title: 16 People Killed by Landslide in Western Madagascar
Description: Islam Times - At least 16 people were killed when a boat they were traveling in on a river in western Madagascar was hit by a landslide, authorities said Wednesday.

Title: President Assad, Iran's Leader Adviser Discuss Bilateral Ties
Description: Islam Times - The senior adviser to the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, Ali Larijani, met and talked with Syrian President Bashar Assad in Damascus on Thursday.

Title: Dutch People’s Unforgettable Lesson to Israelis
Description: Islam Times - As the Israeli war crimes in Gaza and Lebanon persist, waves of global outrage at this regime unfold day by day and now on a dramatic development, the anti-Zionism wave is showing itself among the Western public opinion.

Title: Report: Israeli Army Preparing for Years-Long Presence in Gaza
Description: Islam Times - The Israeli Army is establishing long-term presence in the Gaza Strip, senior military officials told Haaretz daily.

Title: Israeli Police to Question Netanyahu’s Chief of Staff Accused of Blackmailing Officer
Description: Islam Times - Israeli police will question Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s chief of staff over blackmailing of an Israeli occupation officer.

Title: Iran Pledges Strong Retaliation After Israeli Attack Violates Sovereignty

Title: French Prosecutors Seek Prison Term, Election Ban for Le Pen

Title: South Korea to Support Ukraine in Response to Russia-North Korea Alliance: President
Description: Islam Times - South Korea is ready to boost military assistance to Ukraine alongside its allies if Russia and North Korea continue their collaboration, President Yoon Suk Yeol said.

Title: US Appeals Court Reverses $1.68 Billion Judgment against Iran's Central Bank
Description: Islam Times - A US appeals court on Wednesday overturned a $1.68 billion judgment against Iran’s Central Bank.

Title: Iran: Ball in EU/E3 Court, To Negotiate Based on Inalienable Rights
Description: Islam Times - Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi confirmed that Tehran is ready to hold nuclear negotiations with the EU troika based on its interest and rights but not under pressure and intimidation.

Title: UNSC Condemns Targeted Attacks on UNIFIL amid Escalating 'Israeli' Actions in Lebanon
Description: Islam Times - The United Nations Security Council [UNSC] has condemned recent assaults on the UN peacekeeping mission in Lebanon, citing deliberate targeting of UN bases by 'Israeli' occupation forces.

Title: CIA Official Arrested for Leaking Secret Docs on 'Israel'

Title: Pezeshkian: Global Consensus Grows on Iran’s Commitment to Peace and Security
Description: Islam Times - Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian stated that the international community increasingly recognizes Iran's dedication to peace and security, affirming that the country's nuclear program is entirely peaceful.

Title: Sayyed Al-Houthi Condemns US Support for ’Israeli’ Atrocities, Urges Continued Resistance in West Asia

Title: UN Report: 'Israel’s' Gaza Actions Consistent with Genocide
Description: Islam Times - A UN special committee has declared that 'Israel's' tactics in Gaza align with 'genocide,' citing the use of starvation as a weapon of war. The committee's Thursday report details atrocities by 'Israel' since the onset of its ongoing offensive on Gaza in October 2023, covering actions up to July 2024.

Title: Twin 'Israeli' Airstrikes Hit Syrian Capital and Suburb, Leaving Over a Dozen Martyred
Description: Islam Times - At least fifteen people have been martyred in 'Israeli' airstrikes on areas around Damascus, with 'Israeli' aircraft targeting positions in both western Damascus and its surrounding countryside.

Title: IRGC: Resistance Front to Avenge Any Aggression, Deliver Painful Blows to Enemies

Title: IAEA's Grossi Meets with Araqchi in Tehran
Description: Islam Times - Director-General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), Rafael Grossi, met with Abbas Araghchi, Foreign Minister of the Islamic Republic of Iran, on Thursday during his visit to Tehran, where the two engaged in talks.

Title: Violence in Amsterdam Anti-Semitism or Anti-Zionism?
Description: Islam Times - Israeli football fans have clashed with pro-Palestinian protesters on November 8, before and after a Europa League football match between their team Maccabi Tel Aviv and Ajax in Amsterdam.

Title: Thousands Flee As Typhoon Usagi Hits North of Philippines

Title: BRICS Offered Turkey Partner Country Status, Turkish Trade Minister Says

Title: Republicans Win 218 US House Seats, Giving Donald Trump, Party Control of Government

Title: US Views Russia as Present-Day Threat, Trump May Prioritize Containing China: Lavrov
Description: Islam Times - Containing China will be a priority task for the United States under Donald Trump, while Washington views Russia as a 'present-day threat,' Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov said.

Title: Explosions Kill 1 Man outside Brazil’s Supreme Court, Force Justices to Evacuate

Title: WB Annexation Remarks Another Sign of Israel’s Racist, Expansionist Nature: Iran
Description: Islam Times - Iran denounced an Israeli cabinet minister’s statement regarding the annexation of the West Bank, describing it as yet another sign of the Tel Aviv regime’s racist and expansionist nature.

Title: Hezbollah SG Sheikh Naim Qassem’s Letter to the Islamic Resistance Mujahidin
Description: Islam Times - A letter from Hezbollah’s Secretary General Sheikh Naim Qassem to the Mujahidin of the Islamic Resistance

Title: Hezbollah Pounds Israel’s Military Headquarters in Tel Aviv
Description: Islam Times - Lebanon’s resistance movement Hezbollah has for the first time attacked the headquarters of Israel’s military in Tel Aviv.
